page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: 'Area of our block' by Richard Hull 'Folly Gate' by Martin Cornish 'Brightley Mill' by Simon Brittain 'Abbeyford Wood' by David Bidmead 'Brightley Hamlet' by Fiona Goffey 'Curworthy Farm' by Richard Hull 'Knowle Farm' by Joanne Ware 'Knowle Quarry' by Clare Friend 'A day in the life of' by Richard Hull 'Family Life' by Lindsey Sansom 'Industrial Estate' by Steven Sage 'Industrial Estate' by Andrew Phare 'By-Pass' by Terry Law 'A Children's Game' by Lisa Musson 'Village Hall' by Richard Hull 'Crossways Inn' by Lynne Ellis 'Local News' by Lisa Musson 'Place Names' by Katie Hewitt 'Clubs in Folly Gate' by Clare Vernon Class 3H from Okehampton County Primary School. Edited by Mrs. Jane L. Hignett.
